description: Create personalized review request pages that make it easy for customers to leave detailed, authentic reviews. Choose from multiple types, customize everything, and watch your reviews grow.

key_features.title: Emoji Sentiment Flow
key_features.description: Interactive emoji-based review collection that makes leaving reviews fun and engaging for customers.

key_features.title: AI-Powered Content
key_features.description: AI-powered review generation and optimization to help customers write better reviews.

key_features.title: QR Code Generation
key_features.description: Generate QR codes for easy access to your prompt pages from anywhere.

key_features.title: Customization Options
key_features.description: Brand your prompt pages with your business colors, logos, and messaging.

key_features.title: Analytics & Insights
key_features.description: Track performance and gain insights into your review collection efforts.

key_features.title: Multi-Platform Sharing
key_features.description: Distribute your prompt pages across all your marketing channels.

how_it_works.title: Create Your Page
how_it_works.description: Choose your page type and add details. Include customer names, service info, or any context that makes the review personal.

how_it_works.title: Share Your Link
how_it_works.description: Get your unique link, QR code, or NFC tag. Share it however works best—email, text, in-person, or on social media.

how_it_works.title: Customer Leaves Review
how_it_works.description: Your customer lands on a beautiful, personalized page. They can write their own review or use AI assistance to help express their thoughts.

how_it_works.title: Track Your Success
how_it_works.description: Monitor which prompt pages generate the most reviews. See conversion rates, track performance, and optimize your approach.

best_practices.title: Be Specific and Personal
best_practices.description: The more specific your prompt page, the more detailed and helpful the reviews you'll receive. Include customer names, specific services, and relevant context.

best_practices.title: Make It Easy to Share
best_practices.description: Use multiple sharing methods - direct links, QR codes, NFC tags, or email. Meet customers where they are and make leaving reviews effortless.

best_practices.title: Test Different Page Types
best_practices.description: Experiment with different page types (service, product, photo, video) to see what works best for your business and customer base.

best_practices.title: Track and Optimize Performance
best_practices.description: Monitor which prompt pages perform best and use those insights to optimize your approach. Focus on what drives the most authentic reviews.
